sn21.2:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn21.2:4.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
sn21.2:5.1: “Idha mayhaṃ, āvuso, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn21.2:5.2: ‘atthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasmiṃ yassa me vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’ti?
sn21.2:5.4: ‘natthi kho taṃ kiñci lokasmiṃ yassa me vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā’”ti.
sn21.2:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn21.2:6.2: “satthupi kho te, āvuso sāriputta, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
sn21.2:6.3: “Satthupi kho me, āvuso, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā, api ca me evamassa:
sn21.2:6.4: ‘mahesakkho vata bho satthā antarahito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
sn21.2:6.5: Sace hi bhagavā ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ tiṭṭheyya tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
sn21.2:6.6: Tathā hi panāyasmato sāriputtassa dīgharattaṃ ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā susamūhatā.
sn21.2:6.7: Tasmā āyasmato sāriputtassa satthupi vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā nuppajjeyyuṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti.
